name: Outdoor Element Firebiner
description: This little carabiner brings the heat, and anything else you want to clip to it. With its integrated EverSpark spark wheel the Firebiner throws enough brilliant sparks to light a fire, start your camp stove, or ignite the BBQ. Besides being useful for carrying things, Outdoor Element has added a few extra tools to this carabiner.EverSpark fire wheel produces 1,000+ sparks.Integrated: flat head screwdriver, bottle opener, cord cutter and anchor points.Stainless steel construction.Rated at 45kg (100lb), not intended for climbing.Dimensions: 14.6 x 7.5 x 0.6cm.
